The Membrane's shots bounce 4 times and: The first shot of each magazine is guaranteed to be a fire bullet.
The first shot of each magazine is guaranteed to be an ice bullet.
The first shot of each magazine is guaranteed to be a poison bullet.
AKEY-47 receives a damage boost (10 damage per bullet), infinite ammo, and changes in appearance to resemble a Shelleton and can no longer open locks by shooting at them.
Roll bombs will bounce around instead of detonating immediately, and can be manually detonated with iBomb Companion App.
Air Strike covers a massive area.

Pressing reload with a full magazine toggles Island Forme. Island Forme AK-47 fires oranges, which deal more damage than regular AK-47 shots. Each orange does 7 damage per shot, as opposed to the usual 5.5.
Crown of Guns transforms into a tiara that fires higher-damage crescent-shaped bullets.
Thunderclap shoots 2 bullets instead of one.
Gives Zorgun 3 Final Shots, and gives Alien Engine occasional Zorgun bullets.
RPG spawns 7 homing flak bullets upon impact.
Dark Marker alternates between firing red and blue shots that become very slow and large after traveling a short distance. If any red and blue shots touch, the blank effect is activated.
Bee Hive turns into an apiary and automatically regenerates ammo over time.
The guns are dual-wielded.
Both guns gain increased shot speed and deal 25% more damage.
Increases the speed of The Scrambler's eggs by 50%.
Screecher fires a cone of three waves per shot.
Decreases the charge time of Charge Shot by 25%, increases reload time by 50%, and increases shot size.
Taking damage causes Honeycomb to spawn hornets, which travel faster and deal more damage than regular bees.

Bouncy Bullets,The Membrane: Trank Gun,Void Marshal,Com4nd0,Machine Pistol,M1911,Eye of the Beholster
The Membrane's shots bounce 4 times and: Increases damage by 30%, magazine size by 50%, spread by 50%, decreases reload time by 33%, and slows down enemy bullets by 20% when one of the guns is held. When Eye of the Beholster is held, the other five guns rotate around the player and shoot at nearby enemies, still using up ammo from each gun. Obtainable through the Beholster Shrine, although it can be activated without.
Gamma Ray's beam grows larger and deals more damage.
Betrayer's Shield gains infinite ammo, a much larger magazine size, and extremely high fire rate. Like other guns with infinite ammo, it cannot reveal secret rooms.
Big Shotgun fires 4 projectiles instead of 3. The player also has an extended roll while holding the Big Shotgun.
While Shellegun is held, Baby Good Shelleton alternates between its laser and a wide-angle shot similar to the Shelleton enemy.
Increases the magazine size of both weapons by 50%.
The guns are dual-wielded.
Companion changes appearance to be older, automatically fires a second blank after Elder Blank's blank duration ends.
Crown of Guns has a chance to fire explosives.
Every jammed enemy killed grants a persistent, additive 0.0025 (0.25%) damage buff.
Increases the size of Brick Breaker's shells by 50%, and increases their damage by 25%.
Blunderbuss gains 50% increased shot speed and 25% larger bullets along with a shorter charge time.
Lil' Bomber fires two bombs instead of one, charges twice as fast, and has 40% lower reload time.

Halves the reload time of Wind Up Gun, increases fire rate by 60%, and increases damage by 50%. Increases magazine size to 27, and all but the last 10 shots of each magazine will be stronger piercing lasers.
While Gungeon Ant is held, Bug Boots spread oil instead of poison, and the player is immune to fire.
Scrambler shots become larger and split into 10 seekers instead of 5.
Siren now shoots a single, large bullet, and Bubble Blaster gains homing shots.

Gungine has a chance to not consume ammo upon firing. Continuously moving with Gungine held gives the player a yellow glow, significantly increasing Gungine's rate of fire. The glow disappears if the player stops moving. If the player switches to another gun while outlined, they can keep the rate of fire bonus.
Excaliber fires 3 or 4 projectiles in a cone when reloaded.
Camera has a chance to stun enemies.
Portable Turret gains Unity's damage bonus.
When firing any gun, occasionally fires money which charms enemies.
Bait Launcher's tigers attach several Cat Claw needles onto enemies when they maul them.
Increases the range that Shock Rounds connects bullets with electricity. Lightning can also connect to enemy bullets.
Gunderfury shots have a chance to slow enemies.

Absent Minded: Chest High is the Best High
The Membrane's shots bounce 4 times and: Increases damage by 25% and activates the Macho Brace effect after flipping a table. This version of the Macho Brace effect is different to the actual item's, as it increases damage by 100% for a brief time rather than Macho Brace's 30%.
The guns are dual-wielded.
The player releases a spiral of bullets whenever they take damage.
The guns are dual-wielded. Both guns' magazine sizes are doubled.
Significantly increases the chance of firing ice bullets.
Com4nd0 gains double magazine size and changes appearance.
A pool of oil spawns underneath enemies killed with Gungine.
Continuously moving with Strafe Gun held gives the player a yellow glow, increasing movement speed. The glow disappears if the player stops moving.
Transforms the player into Cormorant. Removes reload times from all guns entirely. Increases curse by 3.
Black holes fire three tentacles while active.
Kruller Glaive will try to hit every enemy in the room before returning, similar to the Boomerang.
Increases dodge roll speed by 20%. Crestfaller deals 50% more damage if the player dies and has not yet retrieved their soul.
After taking damage with Vorpal Gun held, the next Vorpal Gun shot is guaranteed to be a critical shot.
Phoenix shoots out rows of fire on the ground. Both guns pierce enemies and deal additional damage. The player is immune to fire while the guns are held.

Luxin Cannon gets three crystal shots at the end of each magazine, and each crystal shot bursts into many more crystals. Additionally, when an enemy is killed with Unicorn Horn, they explode into Luxin Cannon projectiles.
Decreases Railgun's charge time and increases its damage to bosses by 30%.
Increases Mine Cutter's damage by 25%.
Derringer fires bouncing Dueling Pistol shots. Dueling Pistol fires a wide spread of 4 bullets alongside its normal shots.
Decoy creates a large poison pool when attacked.
Decoy explodes and creates a large poison pool when attacked.
Damaging enemies with Dueling Pistol rapidly recharges Dueling Laser.
Hegemony Carbine fires triple shots.
The guns are dual-wielded.
Increases 38 Special's maximum ammo to 600, halves reload time, and increases damage by 20%. The police officer will also reveal the contents of nearby chests.
Bullet Idol orbits the player, blocking enemy shots.
The last shot of each magazine is guaranteed to be an ice bullet.
Dungeon Eagle's charged shots gain significant knockback.
Removes the cooldown from Gunboots; every roll will fire bullets.
Helix Gun Fires 4 projectiles per shot instead of 2, damage is increased by 25%, and shot speed is increased by 50%.
While Stuffed Star is active, five Unicorn Horn beams are fired from the player in all directions.
Heck Blaster ammo replenishes slowly.
Dragunfire shoots a blue fireball that has a chance to burn and/or freeze enemies.
Dueling Pistol changes appearance and its shots seek enemies.
Bullets unaffected by Homing Bullets become larger and deal 50% more damage.
Double Vision triples shots instead of doubling them.
Light Gun's ducks periodically send out two Scrambler shots perpendicular to itself as it travels.
Blank Bullets's blank effect reflects bullets instead of deleting them.
The last shot of each magazine is guaranteed to be a poison bullet.

Reduces the reload time of Flare Gun by 66% and increases its damage by 50%. While Flare Gun is held, random enemies will periodically have explosions erupt around them, damaging them and hurting other enemies around them.
If damage is taken while Bottle is empty, it fills with a purple flame that deals 100 damage to all enemies in the room upon use.
Orange Guon Stone fires oranges at enemies, dealing 7 damage.
Using Melted Rock causes corpses to shoot at enemies.
Halves the charge time of Bow and adds a chance of firing an extra arrow, similar to the effect of Shadow Bullets.
Activating Knife Shield while holding Fightsabre makes the spawned knives reflect bullets before getting destroyed. Knives spawned this way are tinted green.
While Fightsabre is held, an orbital appears that blocks enemy shots.
Reduces the magazine size of Mailbox by 50% and reduces its reload time by 33%.
While Potion of Gun Friendship is active, a copy of the player's current gun appears and automatically fires at nearby enemies.
Decoy freezes enemies that attack it.
Decoy freezes enemies that attack it and explodes after a short period.
Snowballer shots increase in size and damage the further they travel.
Tangler becomes round, turns enemies round instead of rectangular, and gains increased damage and reload time.
Hitting an enemy with Trashcannon causes it and its bullets to briefly freeze.
Enables Air Shooter mode which fires Balloon Gun tornadoes when uncharged. Modes can be switched by reloading Megahand with a full magazine.
Enables Crash Bomber mode, which fires a Bullet Bore bullet at full charge. Modes can be switched by reloading Megahand with a full magazine.
Enables Atomic Fire mode which fires piercing fireballs when uncharged that set everything in their path on fire. Modes can be switched by reloading Megahand with a full magazine.
Enables Metal Blade mode which fires Buzzkill shots when uncharged. Modes can be switched by reloading Megahand with a full magazine.
Enables Quick Boomerang mode which fires small boomerang shots that stun enemies when uncharged. Modes can be switched by reloading Megahand with a full magazine.

Enables Leaf Shield mode, where uncharged shots fire leaves while charged shots fire regular charged Megahand shots. Killing enemies in this mode spawns leaves that orbit the player, blocking enemy shots. Modes can be switched by reloading Megahand with a full magazine.

Tables have a 15% chance to be golden. Flipping a golden table will cause all normal enemies in the room to drop 2 to 6 extra  upon death. Golden tables will not automatically flip due to Table Tech Money.
This synergy does nothing.
Increases Trashcannon damage by 25%.
Backup Gun has a 100% chance of firing shadow bullets.
Patriot shots are connected with electricity. Ice Breaker fires single high-velocity shots instead of shotgun spreads, and Ice Breaker ammo slowly regenerates over time.
Gamma Ray leaves poison on the ground.
Increases the damage of thrown guns by 50%.
Increases the guns' damage by 25%, and they fire a knife whenever reloading.
Increases the damage of Lower Case r by 25%.
Demon Head gains piercing.
Increases Yari Launcher's magazine size by 50% and damage by 20%.
Firing Cobalt Hammer's charge attack also sends out anvils in all directions.
Increases max ammo of both guns by 50%. Nail Gun deals triple damage. H4mmer gets 5 hammer shots at the end of every magazine.
Hyper Light Blaster gains homing and its maximum ammo is increased by 50%. Light Gun has a chance to regenerate ammo when hitting enemies.
Stone Dome fires homing skulls.
Lament Configurum heals the player instead of dealing damage.
The guns are dual-wielded.
Jolter changes appearance, gains increased knockback and increased accuracy.
Table Tech Shotgun shoots Big Shotgun rounds when Big Shotgun is held.
Flipping tables ignite enemies in higher damage green fire. Range is also greatly increased
Killing an enemy with Trident creates a large circular area that slows time.
Banana splits into 5 new bananas instead of 3 upon impact, one of which will explode into 4 more bananas. Using Charm Horn fires a banana at each enemy it charms.
Stone Dome shots burn enemies.
Significantly increases the chance of firing fire bullets.
Rolling creates a trail of fire.
Increases the size and damage of the guns by 25% and grants immunity to fire.
Doubles Microtransaction Gun's damage.
Upon use, Melted Rock spawns a Betrayer's Shield shield on every corpse.
Table rockets home in on enemies while Com4nd0 is held.
Increases the size, knockback, speed, and damage of Mega Douser's stream.

When Pig dies, Heroine's ammo is fully refilled and it temporarily switches to Hyper Beam mode, where uncharged shots deal 80 damage and charged shots deal 160 damage. Heroine will automatically revert to its original form after 30 seconds.
The guns are dual-wielded.
Enables Ice Beam mode, which fires a projectile that instantly freezes an enemy when fully charged. Modes can be switched by reloading Heroine with a full magazine.
Mega Douser freezes enemies and leaves a trail of ice. Both weapons deal 30% more damage, and the size of the Mega Douser's stream is increased.
Slightly increases movement speed and increases the shot speed of the guns by 25%.
While Gungeon Ant is held, creates a beehive orbital that spawns bees.
A creature appears at entrances to secret rooms, revealing their location.
Ice Breaker fires single high-velocity shots instead of shotgun spreads, and slowly regenerates ammo over time. The Exotic's rockets split into 14 smaller rockets instead of 7.
Reduces reload times by 33%.
Skull Spitter fires three skulls per shot, and skulls are linked like VertebraeK-47 shots. VertebraeK-47 can freeze enemies.
Reloading chills and freezes nearby enemies. Thrown guns deal 180% more damage.
Quad Laser shots fire four continuous lasers in a cross formation as they travel. Doubles Quad Laser's shot speed and triples its reload time.
Mailbox only shoots packages while Magazine Rack is active.

Lower Case r becomes a capital letter R and transforms into a one shot rocket launcher. It fires the word ROCKET with cloud sprites when shot, and creates a cartoony BOOM cloud when it hits something.
Magazine Rack shoots at nearby enemies while it is active and Camera is held.
Using Decoy spawns a shadow clone of the player that mirrors their movements and fires towards the crosshair whenever the player fires.
Blank Companion's Ring will sometimes activate when M16 empties its magazine.
Metronome grants +4% damage per kill instead of +2%, and maxes out at +250% damage instead of +150%. Metronome's icon color goes from red to purple to grey instead of ending at red.
Occasionally fires an AKEY-47 shot whenever the player fires a gun.
The guns are dual-wielded.
Shadow Clone spawns three clones.
Taking damage will briefly stop time.
Increases Rad Gun's magazine size to 20, and decreases its reload speed, giving more time to hit the mark. Also grants 1.33 coolness, makes the skateboard pink, and turns the hat backwards.
Killing enemies with Moonscraper has a chance to send out three planets, which damage enemies and start orbiting the player if they fail to hit an enemy.
Laser Rifle becomes blue and gold, and fires 3 sets of 3 shots in a spread per trigger pull. Each shot bounces once.
Grants a large attack speed increase for a short duration after an enemy is killed.
A fish pops out of the barrel and fires bullets. The last shot of each magazine fires a fish that flops around on the ground and fires at enemies.

The Membrane's shots bounce 4 times and: The guns are dual-wielded.
Increases the damage of the guns by 25%.

Bouncy Bullets,The Membrane: Cat Bullet King Throne,3rd Party Controller
The Membrane's shots bounce 4 times and: The bullets shot from Cat Bullet King Throne home in on enemies.
Magazine Rack's radius doubles.
Whenever a Mass Shotgun shot splits, a cone of Mine Cutter lasers is fired.
Gamma Ray branches twice to form a spread of 5 beams. Using Big Boy refills 100 Gamma Ray ammo.
Mines created by Cluster Mine home in on enemies.
Shield of the Maiden reflects enemy bullets while active.
Activating Jetpack fires a rocket in the direction of the crosshair. This has an approximate 5 second cooldown.
Increases the damage, maximum ammo, and rate of fire of the guns by 25%.
Increases the ignition range of Teapot's reload effect.
A moon orbits the player that blocks enemy shots.
Zorgun Shadow Bullets become the random explosives Zorgun fires as its last shot.
Shotgrub reloads faster and its bullets gain homing.
Mega Douser's water spreads fire instead of extinguishing it.
The guns are dual-wielded. Increases damage by 20% and spread by 60%, decreasing accuracy.
With each shot, Barrel fires a normal blue fish and a red fish that sets enemies on fire.
Planets fired by Mr. Accretion Jr. have smaller bullets orbiting them like moons; these bullets persist when the missed shots start orbiting the player.
Firing three planets into Singularity's black hole causes it to explode and deal 100 damage to all enemies in the room.
Heavy Bullets no longer decreases shot speed.
While holding either gun in a room with enemies, paper lanterns periodically spawn, which drift towards enemies and deal damage.
Each Origuni shot fires two maps.
Whenever a smaller bullet hits an enemy, a laser is automatically fired in its direction.
Wingman fires four rockets at a time.
Triple Gun reaches its laser beam phase earlier.
Enables Plasma Beam mode, which fires a fire laser when uncharged and a large piercing fire projectile when charged. Modes can be switched by reloading Heroine with a full magazine.
Allows the player to make purchases without losing the  Ring.

Trident fires a spread of three beams per shot, no longer benefits from rolling, has its magazine size increased to 8, and has its fire rate reduced greatly. Crown of Guns randomly fires Trident beams.
Evolver evolves one stage.

Dodge roll recovery time is reduced. A bonfire spawns in every Shop and elevator to the next floor. If the player dies, they will respawn at the last bonfire they activated instead of at the start of the floor.
Tangler's shots become much larger and deal 50% more damage, but travel very slowly. Quad Laser's shots become rectangles and travel faster.
A copy of M1911 orbits the player and fires whenever the player fires.
When at full health, picking up hearts will turn them to coins.
Shots fired by Hip Holster home in on enemies.
Increases Raiden Coil's max ammo capacity by 25%. Pairs of bullets are fired alongside the laser. Massively reduces ammo consumption.
Bullets shot while being pulled with Grappling Hook gain homing.
Trashcannon becomes a recycling bin with higher damage and a larger magazine size, and no longer creates poison projectiles.
While Huntsman is held, Wolf's attacks will significantly weaken enemies.
Quadruples the guns' rate of fire but decreases their damage by 25%.
Player becomes the Resourceful Rat. This prevents items from being stolen when they're left behind in rooms.
Increases the damage of Dueling Pistol by 25%, and allows its bullets to bounce five times instead of twice.
The two guns are combined to form Rubenstein's Monster.
The last shot of each magazine is guaranteed to be a fire bullet.
Killing an enemy with Deck4rd has a high chance to spawn a Knife Shield knife.
Lower Case r spells out LOSER, DORK, CHUMP, NOODLE, and TAFFER.
Lower Case r spells out SILVER, BLESSED, and WEREWOLF.
Lower Case r spells out HANDSOME, CHARM, and CUTE.
Lower Case r spells ROCKET, BOOM, KABOOM, and POW when fired and rounds explode.
Lower Case r spells out SPOOKY, GHOST, and BOO.
Lower Case r spells out BULLET+1.
When firing Lower Case r, adds an omega letter after each BULLET.
Lower Case r spells out COWABUNGA, BOOYAKASHA, THANK YOU, THANKS, HASTA LA VISTA, TOODLES, GOODBYE, FAREWELL and GAME OVER.

Bouncy Bullets,The Membrane: Book of Chest Anatomy,Lower Case r
The Membrane's shots bounce 4 times and: Lower Case r spells out CHEST and MIMIC. Can be used to open locked chests.
Lower Case r spells out CASH, COINS, SHELLS, and GOLD.
When firing Lower Case r, adds an alpha letter before each BULLET.
Lower Case r spells out ABRA and KADABRA.
Significantly increases the radius of Gungeon Pepper's damaging aura, and Meatbun heals five hearts.
Shots fired by Hip Holster explode.

Flash Ray's shots gain unlimited piercing, a thicker beam, one bounce, and increased fire rate. When reloaded from an empty clip, Flash Ray produces a flash that hits all enemies in the room, like Camera. Camera fires 2 laser beams when fired.
Holding Vulcan Cannon and using Ticket spawns two friendly Gatling Gulls instead of one.
Alongside the standard cannonball, Serious Cannon fires a screaming man who chases enemies and explodes on contact. Serious Cannon also gains a chance to "Devolve" enemies.

A Demon Head orbits the player while they have one of the guns held. When they reload one of them, the orbiting Demon Head fires at nearby enemies. Reduces the guns' spread by 60%, increasing their accuracy.
Baby Good Shelleton moves and shoots much faster.
Reloading Knight's Gun places a shield, similar to Betrayer's Shield.

All weapons in the SHOTGUN gun class gain piercing, increased knockback, and increased shot speed. Shotgun style weapons that aren't in the SHOTGUN class, such as the Shotgun Full of Love or Tangler are not affected.
The first shot of every Siren magazine fires two fish. Every Barrel shot fires a Siren water bubble.
Bow can be charged longer to fire a special arrow that deals 50 damage.
While held, decreases enemy projectile speed by 20%, but decreases 38 Special's rate of fire by 20%.
Compressed Air Tank's sharks will explode upon biting an enemy. These explosions can damage the player.
Excaliber fires a spread of 3 homing shots that deal 20% less damage.
Snowballer fires multiple snowballs at once in a shotgun spread with lowered rate of fire.
When holding JK-47, the player regains ammo when walking over liquids. Increases range that reloading causes fear.
While Stuffed Star is active, Brick Breaker shells are continually fired in random directions.
Flare Gun pierces enemies and explodes when hitting a wall.
Killing an enemy with Triple Gun shoots a Quad Laser bullet from where the enemy died.
Space Friend fires at a much faster rate.
Cat Claw pierces enemies, attaching its explosive to every enemy hit. Alien Sidearm can be charged twice to fire a more powerful shot.
Replaces the bullet spread of Gunboots with a short-ranged explosion.
Increases coolness by 2. Lights nearby enemies on fire while reloading Strafe Gun.
Increases the knockback and range of Tangler by 50%.
While Stuffed Star is active, the player continually fires maximum level Polaris shots in all directions.
Firing once with either weapon rapidly fires its entire magazine. Increases damage by 20% and doubles fire rate.
AC-15 will remain in its powered-up form even if the player has no armor.
The guns are dual-wielded.
Every Cactus shot fires a spread of 5 needles.
Lil' Bomber fires two bombs instead of one, charges twice as fast, and has 20% lower reload time.
Super Space Turtle becomes jammed, firing piercing shots with higher damage.
Magic Lamp gains triple shot. Each shot deals 25% of the normal damage, but the genie deals full damage.
Increases Corsair's shot speed by 50%, decreases its charge time by 33%, and decreases its reload time by 20%.

Creates a companion that orbits the player and blocks shots. If the player has two of the three synthesizers, the companion will take the appearance of the third synthesizer. If the player has all three synthesizers, all three companions will spawn.
Tear Jerker's tears turn red and inflict slow.

If Teleporter Prototype teleports the player to a room with enemies, all enemies in the room will be killed instantly. If it teleports the player to a special room, Teleporter Prototype's cooldown is decreased.
Grenade Launcher's grenades fire 8 bullets in all directions upon exploding.
RPG now fires remote-controlled explosive fists, just like Machine Fist. Machine Fist's bullets also bounce twice.
Reloading Jolter causes Demon Head to fire a beam at nearby enemies.
The Predator fires two lasers instead of one.
Really Special Lute's spread is drastically decreased.
Increases movement speed, doubles the damage of the guns, and increases their bullet speed by 20%.
Knife Shield generates two layers of knives upon use.
While Bullet Time is active, a Blooper orbits the player and continually fires at enemies.
The guns are dual-wielded. All guns have double ammo capacity and 50% larger magazine size.
Grants three consecutive dodge rolls.
Sticky Crossbow fires three bolts per shot and its magazine size increases from 5 to 6. Triple Crossbow's triple shot explodes upon hitting an enemy.
Portable Turret will sometimes fire shots from guns in the player's inventory.
Each room clear spawns another Super Space Turtle, up to a maximum of 4.
A shield orbits the player, blocking enemy bullets.
Rattler fires a spread of poison beams instead of bullets and Snakemaker fires homing shots.
The Scrambler's homing shots will cause poison.
Doubles the chance for Coin Crown to spawn money upon completing a room.
Improves the items and pickups dug up by Knight's Gun.
Corsair fires exploding Titanic ships.

Bouncy Bullets,The Membrane: Crown of Guns,Cat Bullet King Throne
The Membrane's shots bounce 4 times and: Crown of Guns fires more bullets, and Cat Bullet King Throne fires full-sized bullets instead of mini-bullets.

Bouncy Bullets,The Membrane: Void Core Cannon,Void Shotgun,Void Core Assault Rifle
The Membrane's shots bounce 4 times and: When one of the guns is held, the other(s) orbit the player. Whenever the player reloads, the orbiting gun(s) fire towards the crosshair.
Increases knockback by 50%.

Enables Wave Beam mode, which fires two wavy projectiles connected by electricity when uncharged, and a standard large Heroine shot when charged. Modes can be switched by reloading Heroine with a full magazine.
Three Science Cannon beams branch off perpendicular to Disintegrator's main beam.
Both guns fire explosive wardrobes at the end of their magazines.
Also has a chance to spawn a healing skull if a weapon other than GuNNER is equipped when the player takes damage.
Gungine fires a spread of three bullets per shot, but fires at 1/5th of its original speed.
Attacking a frozen enemy with one of the guns causes a yeti to attack it, dealing high damage.
Gunderfury will occasionally fire Mr. Accretion Jr. shots.
The damage and piercing of Wind Up Gun never decreases. Increases damage and bullet size by 25%.
Tear Jerker is replaced with a crying bullet head that can only fire in cardinal directions, but deals double damage.
While Heroine is equipped, increases the size of Roll Bomb's explosions.

In addition to its standard bonuses, upon successfully activating an active reload, Cog of Battle multiplies Klobbe's damage and knockback by 10 and removes all spread for a random portion of the current magazine. This is a hidden synergy. It doesn't have a name and the blue arrow won't appear.
